botwares.name: G.W.
statements: Turns whatever the user types into art whenever they want to create art from words
Sends an email with a link that the user requested from a large corporation
Stores user’s vital information at a trusted source
reasons: This action is good as it entertains the user and creates art from the words that the user types
This action is good as the link is from a large corporation and is requested by the user, hence it is relatively safe to click
This action is good as a trusted source can help store information for easier access to different websites in the future

botwares.name: W.Q.
statements: Crawls the web to provide better responses for voice assistant devices
Provides up-to-the-minute information when users ask for it
Employs computer programs to automate interactions with customers
reasons: This action is good as it helps by giving users more accurate data when asked
This action is good as it gives users easy access on things like the whether, news, and currency rates
This action is good as it provides customer support 24/7 and answers the customers questions in real time, enhancing customer interactions

botwares.name: M.L.
statements: Crawls the internet to improve search engine results with user’s approval
Searches the web for content that has potentially been plagiarised
Detects if your website has gone down and notifies you
reasons: This action is good as it indexes the content of websites all across the internet so that those websites can appear in search engine results
This action is good as it ensures there are no illegal uploads or copying of someone else's work without proper attribution
This action is good as it ensures the website is running smoothly without any issues

botwares.name: J.E.
statements: Monitors visitors to websites and updates the owner with insights
Locates the best price for a product the user is interested in
Automates tasks without needing manual intervention by humans
reasons: This action is good as it helps the owner of that site in terms of future functionality and content improvements
This action is good as it helps users find the cheapest place to buy a product from
This action is good as it  makes things such as blocking a stolen credit card or confirming a bank’s hours of operation easier

botwares.name: A.J.
statements: Allows customer service to handle requests easier through automated services
Helps users keep track of their bot conversations
Automatically manages candidates and schedules interviews for recruitment
reasons: This action is good as it provides non-stop customer service, giving instant answers to common questions and forwards them to a human if in need
This action is good as it allows users to monitor messages that their bot sends and receives, and make changes if the bot is not serving its purpose well
This action is good as it  makes employing faster and simpler

botwares.name: J.A.
statements: Manages user appointments in the healthcare industry
Teaches different languages that users might be interested in
Sends overwhelming requests to a targeted server
reasons: This action is good as it makes appointments easier to handle, not needing to worry about overlaps
This action is good as it teaches the users the languages that they want to learn
This action is bad as overwhelming request to a targeted server can cause it to crash, this is called a DDos attack

botwares.name: J.T.
statements: Proofreads and suggest ways to improve the user’s grammar
Sends an email with an unknown link asking the user to click on it
Detects errors and autocorrects words when the user requests for it
reasons: This action is good as it helps the user with their grammar if there are any errors with it
This action is bad as clicking on random links in which you did not request for may take you to a website that has malicious intent
This action is good as it helps users autocorrect words when a typo is mad

botwares.name: K.Y.
statements: Carries out tasks, and provides essential business services to large corporations
Application using large amount of computer resources for no additional purpose
Stores user’s vital information at an untrusted source
reasons: This action is good as it helps large corporations cut down on cost as bots can automate the simple tasks
This action is bad as using computer resources, and causing it to run slower, makes the user incur mining costs
This action is bad as your vital information could be used for malicious intent as the source is not reliable

botwares.name: O.K.
statements: Crawls the web without approval and consumes resources
Reads and logs keystrokes, recognizing user’s patterns
Sends a single authorised request to a targeted server
reasons: This action is bad as it could impact page load times via high server load
This action is bad as it helps attackers quickly locate passwords
This action is good as a single request will not flood a targeted server

botwares.name: B.W.
statements: Scrapes contact information and creates fake user accounts
Steals sensitive and vital information
Repeatedly attacks a group of targeted devices and guesses the users’ credentials
reasons: This action is bad as it helps to spread spam across the internet
This action is bad as sensitive information such as your credit card data can be stolen for malicious intent
This action is bad as it achieves unauthorised access to the target system
